General.Name: Wave Cyber Shanghai Co Ltd
General.Description: Wave Cyber (Shanghai)Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells water treatment components. The company offers pressure tanks, membrane pressure vessels, reverse osmosis and nanofiltration membrane sheets and elements, brine tanks and cabinets, etc. Its products are used in material concentration and separation, as well as water treatment and municipal applications. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shanghai, China.
